phrases: Does not that just mean no one's being bothered by spirits?
But we need food on our table!
We have to make a move.
You do not know what true fear is
Surely you have discussed some with friends at some point.
They were super popular when I was a kid.
Like Hanako-san in the bathroom or the human-faced dog...
Or, if you want something newer, the Dragger.
We will look up sighting reports online and follow these urban legends.
So it is like when we went to find the tsuchinoko?
The Dragger is completely made up.
Places where urban legends are popular
tend to have a lot of people who easily believe in the supernatural.
Meaning they are gold mines for exorcism jobs.
You are so excited about this Schadenfreude search.
The key to successful walk-in sales is a smile!
I did not think this through.
Uh, we might be bothering the pedestrians.
Who said you could conduct your business here?
You dare set up shop here knowing that I,
Rising Sun Spiritual Union Shinra Banshomaru
Shinra Banshomaru, the greatest psychic of this century, hold jurisdiction here?
He is the greatest of this century, too?
You are not a member of the Rising Sun Spiritual Union?
If you are also running a spirit conbusiness,
could you introduce me to some clients?
I have not had too many lately.
I am not about to help a business rival.
This is clearly a traffic violation.
You guys have no right to bring up the law.
And what do you mean by that?
I would like to discuss something with you.
Happy to help you out, madam!
So what did you want to discuss?
I have always been susceptible to spirits.
I often attract ghosts and other strange phenomena near me.
Even as we speak, there is something next to me...
What did you say, you swine?
Fakes like you make my job so much harder.
It is the spirit of a middle-aged man.
Let us get back on track.
When I asked about it on the internet, all I got was irresponsible advice.
I cannot believe I never thought about a website.
I will make one as soon as I am home.
And lately, I have been feeling a really bad aura.
I have only been able to get by thanks to having a plate of salt in my apartment.
Textbooks confirm the effectiveness of piles of salt.
Even as we speak, the sodium from this pile of French fries
Mob, do not eat too many of those.
But then I realized that the reason this eerie feeling has gotten worse lately
is because of the sudden spread of urban legends around this city.
It is said that the vengeful spirit of a middle-aged man who committed suicide possessed a dog.
It rummages through the trash downtown, and if you call it, it will say, Just leave me alone.
When you are driving on the freeway in the middle of the night, you might hear a tapping on your window.
You will then see a granny running alongside your car at the same speed.
Apparently, if she outruns you, you will get into a car accident.
It wanders endlessly through the city in the rain, dressed in all red.
If someone sees the red raincoat, they will die.
However, if you are wearing something red, your life will be spared.
Dressed in torn white clothing, the Dragger drags people around until they are but lumps of meat.
When she was human, she suffered from horrible bullying, and from that hatred, she will capture children and drag them around.
Human-Faced Dog, Dash Granny, the Red Raincoat,
Please, eliminate all of these urban legends.
Who would take such an impossible request?
Please leave it to me, Reigen Arataka!
I will make sure they are wiped off the face of this earth!
So, which course would you like to go with?
I recommend this weekend combo deal...
I must say, I was surprised you accepted a request like that.
And 20,000 yen if the request works out?
You would ask for about that much, would not you?
If I actually took on this request, it would be more than 500,000
Well, you will still be helping me with this.
If we keep wasting time, the sun's going to go down.
It is Shinra Banshomaru, and I am not going to help you!
You heard her out with me, so do not you dare run away.
I will make sure you get your cut.
Let us split up and do some investigating.
New Star of the Psychic World
Let us remember the three Cs: contact, communicate, and consult.
I will consider this charity work and help you out.
Yeah, I am counting on you.
Like you have anything better to do.
I am making myself less visible because I am sick of talking to you.
Come on, do not be like that.
Tail that chubster using that stealth mode of yours.
If he runs off, just let him go.
Nah, I bet he is a super serious moron that does everything by the book.
Meaning, if something were to happen to him,
it would be my fault for making him do this.
It would be better to avoid any accidents.
You are going to have to listen to one of my demands sometime soon, Shigeo!
Well, it is like the client said.
Something is weird about this town.
There might actually be something here.
Why did we come to an internet cafe?
If I go around questioning kids, people might think I am someone suspicious.
My teacher is so frickin' annoying.
Who do they think they are, bossing me around every day?
It is all just a bunch of complaints.
Someone was sucking up to the math teacher today.
Do people seriously enjoy doing that?
The old guy with the bad eyes who lives on Fourth has a human-faced dog
hhh2954. Re: Hey, did you see?
Should go check it out sometime,
There must be something useful within this barrage of complaints...
hhhh2955. Re: Re: Hey, did you see?
Did you hear that the dash granny showed up in OO Tunnel?
2957. Re: This is scary I have heard of her, but I do not know anyone who is seen her
We saw an old guy in red earlier.
He tried to talk to us, so we ran away.
Why is this guy breathing so heavily?
I just got a bit excited...
Uh, wait, I did not mean excited in that kind of way...
Why are you looking at me like that?
I am an extremely well-known psychic!
Like that does not sound shady...
Hey, do not throw rocks at me!
You must be the Red Raincoat!
Do not get in my way!
There is nothing fun about exposing myself to another guy!
So you are a flasher who goes after children?
I may not look it, but I was vice captain of the sumo club in grade school!
I give up, so let me go!
I was on the track team in middle school, fatty!
I guess the sighting report was fake.
No, this is definitely the human-faced dog.
This is usually how rumors go.
To grade and middle school kids, this is the real deal.
Hey, someone is at our human-faced dog's house.
The old guy who lives here.
His eyes are bad, so he has not noticed we scribbled on its face.
I will kick your asses the next time you try to draw on this dog's face!
So he says after he actually hit us.
We are going to tell the PTA on you.
You know what this world needs?
Adults who can keep you little shits in line!
Do not think that I, Suzuki Taro, am going to be a pushover like your teachers.
But you use a fake name anyway?
You will give Terror a bath?
Then, I guess I will take you up on your offer.
Look at him happily wag his tail with his ominous-sounding name.
We will need before and after pictures for our progress report.
I wonder if he just likes dogs.
Did you know it was just a prank to begin with?
Were you actually looking for a dog with a person's face?
Let us see if we can get some hot water for him.
I may have been in the sumo club in grade school,
but in middle school, I was on the table tennis team!
I am plenty confident about my stamina!
You are so out of breath, though.
This has nothing to do with you.
Even a civilian can arrest a criminal in the act.
Let the blades of justice strike you down, you pervert!
You seriously thought you caught me?
I led you here on purpose!
I will admit, this all started as an unusual fetish.
But before long, I started finding pleasure in rumors of me spreading around town.
I felt like some kind of celebrity!
Just by wearing this raincoat, I feel unstoppable!
You want to turn me in to the police?
I would love to see you try!
But he and others saw my face, which will make things harder for me in this town.
Guess it is time to leave.
What, it is just some crazy bitch?
I will let you drink until you explode, then!
I have not recovered from being tased!
Guess Reigen was right to send me as insurance!
Her aura's stabbing me left and right.
Guess I will try to drag out all of this guy's latent powers.
You tryin' to hit on me?
I am not a fan of forceful girls!
To think his manual would save him this way...
I will happily turn tail and run away!
I need to send an SO IS!
Mob, how did you get that wet?
Hey, did you get any info...
No wonder she is trending in the urban legends world.
Maybe because she is all over social media, she is got way more energy fueling her.
And now she is going for function over form.
If I let this guy die, Shigeo will lose faith in me.
And I cannot let that happen!
He is going to be even bigger someday.
I cannot mess up at a place like this.
Wow, so that is the Dragger?
I need to get a photo for proof.
She is not showing up on my screen.
That is a monster born from rumors.
You cannot classify her as real or fake.
and their fear and curiosity, is what gave birth to her.
Her looks and her strength was all decided by humans!
So you are saying their imagination became reality?
And since we know about the Dragger, we will not be able to exorcise her.
Was not there a time as a kid when you were frightened by rumors about her?
The Dragger would appear before kids heading home from school,
snatching them up and dragging them into the bog...
I did not believe in Santa Claus,
but thinking about her on rainy days as I passed street corners
That fear is still burned into our brains.
We are even trembling as we speak.
So I am breaking out in a cold sweat because I am scared deep down?
Powers used in fear only empower its source.
She grows by absorbing the powers of those who fear her.
Then we have no choice but to run.
Did not you hear him, Mob?
Your powers will be absorbed, too!
He is detached from urban legends, fads, and other hot topics among people.
He is completely out of the loop!
So he has no idea what makes the Dragger so scary!
It is a ghost that appears on rainy days, right?
It is not exactly not scary.
The Dragger has a grip strength of 500 kilograms!
Once she grabs you, you cannot escape!
And she can swim 100 meters in 20 seconds!
Oh, so that is the kind of character she is.
You would basically written a fanfic about her in your head, did not you?
You should at least pretend to be scared or shocked by these things.
This is why nobody clues you in.
But you used to say that I did not have to be like others.
Lip service gains importance as you grow up.
I got injured while I was unconscious?
I am going to the police now to talk to them about the flasher.
Well, I guess we should check out Dash Granny before we leave.
Looks like we got here at the perfect time.
The Dragger does not even compare...
There is only one thing we can do!
Hey, what happens if she catches up?
Apparently, she jumps on your back and strangles you to death!
Turns out she was just some old lady running...
Could not you have used your powers to teleport or something?
But that old lady beat me!
It is not a competition, man.
Well, I got that old lady's picture,
so I guess our work here is done.
Dash Granny would become Mob's first traumatic experience with urban legends.
Now we will get even more jobs!
Spirits and Such Consul tation Office
The star psychic of the 21st century who defeated the Dragger
I am getting one job after another because of my webpage!
But wait, Mob's been acting a bit weird.
That is also a wise decision.
